import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import SosModal from "./SosModal"; export default function UserDashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const currentUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("currentUser") || "{}"); const [showSos, setShowSos] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("currentUser"); navigate("/"); }; return (
